section.title: jevois::dnn::PostProcessorDetectYOLOforPython Class Reference

section.para: A bit hacky since PostProcessorDetectYOLO is a Component that holds parameters. This class will add a PostProcessorDetectYOLO subcomponent to the current module, and then will forward yolo post-processing requests to it.
Definition at line 447 of file PythonModule.H.

listitem.para: Constructor constructs itsYOLO and adds it to current module.
Destructor removes itsYOLO from current module.

boost::python::tuple jevois::dnn::PostProcessorDetectYOLOforPython::yolo (boost::python::list outs, int nclass, float boxThreshold, float confThreshold, int bw, int bh, int fudge, int maxbox)
Generic raw YOLO processing.
The returned tuple has 3 elements: list of int for classIds, list of float for confidences, and list of 4-element tuples of floats for boxes (x, y, w, h).
